[Page Title: Silver Dollar - Upper King, Charleston, SC]

× 
Let us host your special event!

Whether a birthday party, office function or any other special occasion - we take care of all the fine details, bringing your event to life, just as you imagined.

Host your next party or get together with us! Indoor and outdoor patio areas are available. Full bar, TVs, pool tables, photo and DJ booths, and more available. Inquire now.
Book your party

Bridge Run & Oyster Roast 
Post-Run Party & All You Can Eat Oysters

Get ready to fuel up and celebrate at Silver Dollar’s Bridge Run Bash & Oyster Roast on Saturday, April 5th at 10am!
Buy Tickets for Post-Run Party & All You Can Eat Oysters Welcome To Silver Dollar 
Experience the difference

Opened in December of 1999, the Silver Dollar is the longest running bar on upper King Street. Located in the heart of downtown Charleston's night life district, the "Dollar" is renowned for our fun, relaxed atmosphere. With nightly live music, dance floor, great drinks, and innovative drink specials, the Silver Dollar has provided Charlestonians a place to unwind for generations.
Music & Events Celebrate Your Event With Us! 
Not only are we professional caterers, but we are also experienced event planners. Our all-in-one packages are designed with your budget in mind, meaning all you have to do is enjoy the event.

Reviews
Start stop reviews carousel 
Review by - Google

Jessica S:
five star review by 
Silver Dollar has always been a good time! The bartenders are amazing and the DJ/Music is on point. If you're looking for a more laid back, casual dance club I would recommend this place.

Review by - Google

Thomas W:
five star review by 
Probably the best bar I have ever been to. Although it was crowded, the bartenders hustled to make sure we were taken care of. The live music was also unbelievable. John Mayer happened to be there and joined the band for two of his popular songs and then added Jimmy Buffet's 'Come Monday' for an encore. The crowd went wild! I'll never forget the night at the Silver Dollar!

Review by - Google

Kristen D:
five star review by 
We came here for a bachelorette party. We were on our way to Republic but the music here was awesome so we popped in to check it out. It was awesome! The DJ was great and played music that kept the party going.

Review by - Google

Jolene L:
five star review by 
We just had the BEST pierogis (we tried three kinds) fantastic! And we ordered the Lazanki. We LOVED it. The Silver Dollar is a bar with gourmet food served in take out. A hidden gem on King Street! I have never seen Polish food offered at a bar, but it beats nachos any day. Not to be a snob about bar food; they do offer sliders too!.

[Page Title: Silver Dollar - Music & Events]

Music & Events

DJ Dougie

Sunday January 18th

The weekend ain't over yet... Come soak it all up with great music and beats from DJ Dougie from 9pm-close!

09:00 PM - 02:00 AM

Karaoke Night

Tuesday January 20th

Every Tuesday

Break up those mid-week blues with some karaoke... it's always free to sing and always delivered by our resident karaoke host, DJ Wild Bill! The mic opens up at 9pm.

09:00 PM - 02:00 AM

Karaoke Night

Wednesday January 21st

Every Wednesday

Wednesdays are for Silver Dollar!!! Warm up your singing voice, get some liquid courage in you, and step up to the stage starting at 9pm! DJ Wild Bill will be standing by to hook you up with any track, and will even help you with duos :)

09:00 PM - 02:00 AM

Throwback Thursday

Thursday January 22nd

Every Thursday

It's pretty much the weekend... Come kick off the night with rotating DJs  and throwback jams. We'll have $5 well drinks all night long!

09:30 PM - 02:00 AM

Acoustic Friday

Friday January 23rd

Every Friday

Happy Friday! We'll have all the right tunes to kick off the weekend with Justin Wideman at 6:30pm, followed by DJ Seth G from 10pm-close!  Featuring $5 house liquors, wines and local beers from 6-8pm!

06:00 PM - 02:00 AM
